::Firearm/Rex::

Firearm and Rex arrive at the brig, putting BrightBlade and Gangon into 
seperate cells, and activating the anti-sound systems. Rex looks at Firearm.

"I'll stay on duty here, go see if everything's fine now," he says, turning 
around to keep an eye on the two new prisoners. Firearm nods, walking off 
toward the bridge.
